description: ev.energy automatically allows you to charge your electric vehicle in the most cost-effective and least carbon-intense way possible, all while you earn cash rewards for your smart charging! Available in the https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315, https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315 and https://apps.apple.com/de/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315.
name: ev.energy
tagline: A cheaper, greener, simpler way to charge your EV

localize.description: ev.energyは、電気自動車の充電を自動的に行うことで、最も費用対効果が高く、二酸化炭素排出量の少ない方法で充電を行うことができます。https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315、https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315、https://apps.apple.com/de/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315 でご利用いただけます。
localize.tagline: より安く、より環境に優しく、よりシンプルにEVを充電する方法。

localize.description: ev.energy可以自动让你以最经济、最不含碳的方式为你的电动车充电，同时你还可以通过智能充电获得现金奖励! 可在https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315, https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315 和 https://apps.apple.com/de/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315。
localize.tagline: 一种更便宜、更环保、更简单的电动车充电方式

localize.description: ev.energy可以自動讓你以最經濟、最不含碳的方式爲你的電動車充電，同時你還可以通過智能充電獲得現金獎勵! 可在https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315, https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315 和 https://apps.apple.com/de/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315。
localize.tagline: 一種更便宜、更環保、更簡單的電動車充電方式
